36.eng-name: The Book of the Kind Treatment of Women

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"I never saw any woman who made food like Safiyyah. She sent a dish to the Prophet in which was some food, and I could not keep myself from breaking it. I asked the Prophet what the expiation was for that, and he said: 'A dish like that dish, and food like that food
